title: Bitcoin Fundamentals
description: Test your knowledge of Bitcoin basics including blockchain, mining, and transactions.

questions.question: What is Bitcoin?
options: A physical coin made of gold
questions.explanation: Bitcoin is a digital cryptocurrency that operates on a decentralized network.

questions.question: What technology does Bitcoin use to secure transactions?
questions.explanation: Bitcoin uses blockchain technology to create a secure, decentralized ledger of transactions.

questions.question: What is the maximum number of Bitcoins that can ever exist?
questions.explanation: Bitcoin has a maximum supply of 21 million coins, making it deflationary.

questions.question: What is 'mining' in Bitcoin?
options: Creating new Bitcoins and validating transactions
questions.explanation: Mining is the process of creating new Bitcoins and validating transactions on the network.

questions.question: Bitcoin transactions are irreversible once confirmed.
questions.explanation: Bitcoin transactions are irreversible once they are confirmed on the blockchain.
